sources.name: GetDimRelationship
sources.script:
source(output(
		XDimID as integer,
		YDimID as integer,
		DimKindID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table') ~> GetDimRelationship

sources.name: TermRelationships
sources.script:
source(output(
		RelationshipID as integer,
		XTermID as integer,
		XTermDimID as integer,
		YTermID as integer,
		YTermDimID as integer,
		TermKindID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table') ~> TermRelationships

sources.name: LookupTable
sources.script:
source(output(
		TermID as integer,
		DimID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	query: 'SELECT Term.TermID, Term.DimID FROM dbo.intermediateTerm Term',
	format: 'query') ~> LookupTable

sinks.name: InsertRelationship
sinks.script:
MarkForInsertion sink(input(
		RelationshipID as integer,
		TermXID as integer,
		TermYID as integer,
		KindID as integer,
		Description as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	mapColumn(
		TermXID = XTermID,
		TermYID = YTermID,
		KindID = DimKindID
	)) ~> InsertRelationship

sinks.name: DeleteRelationship
sinks.script:
MarkForDeletion sink(input(
		RelationshipID as integer,
		TermXID as integer,
		TermYID as integer,
		KindID as integer,
		Description as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:true,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['RelationshipID'],
	mapColumn(
		RelationshipID,
		TermXID = XTermID,
		TermYID = YTermID,
		KindID = DimKindID
	)) ~> DeleteRelationship

transformations.name: MergeJoin
transformations.script:
GetDimRelationship, TermRelationships join(XDimID == XTermDimID
	&& YDimID == YTermDimID
	&& DimKindID == TermKindID,
	joinType:'outer',
	broadcast: 'none')~> MergeJoin

transformations.name: ConditionalSplit
transformations.script:
MergeJoin split(isNull(XTermID),
	isNull(XDimID),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit@(Insert, Delete, UpdateDoNothing)

transformations.name: Select1
transformations.script:
LookupXTerm select(mapColumn(
		YDimID,
		DimKindID,
		RelationshipID,
		XTermID = TermID,
		YTermID
	))~> Select1

transformations.name: Select2
transformations.script:
LookupYTerm select(mapColumn(
		DimKindID,
		XTermID,
		YTermID = TermID
	))~> Select2

transformations.name: LookupXTerm
transformations.script:
ConditionalSplit@Insert, LookupTable join(XDimID == DimID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupXTerm

transformations.name: LookupYTerm
transformations.script:
Select1, LookupTable join(YDimID == DimID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupYTerm

transformations.name: SelectForDeletion
transformations.script:
ConditionalSplit@Delete select(mapColumn(
		XDimID,
		DimKindID,
		RelationshipID,
		XTermID,
		YTermID
	))~> SelectForDeletion
